name: Quirk eMarketing
overview: What the Quirk? Quirk eMarketing is Africa’s largest full service online marketing agency with branches in London, Cape Town and Johannesburg. Quirk was born in March 1999 with the sole purpose of providing innovative eMarketing services to the global business community. Known for being smart and creative, the QuirkStars have a passion for digital and are constantly updating their skills and services in the belief that enough is never enough. Using their unique knowledge and abilities, the Stars apply the fusion of marketing and technology for the benefit of your business. Today, Quirk is an ever-growing agency with a loyal client base that includes brands like Capitec Bank, MWEB, Warner Bros., Sun International and DStv.

offices.address1: The Boulevard, 3rd Floor Block C, cnr Searle & Pontac Street East
